dcterms:description: A dataset for image captioning that includes images and their corresponding captions, used to evaluate the performance of models in generating descriptive text for images.
dcterms:title: COCO Image Caption dataset

dcterms:description: A large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, containing pairs of sentences labeled with entailment, contradiction, or neutral.
dcterms:title: Stanford Natural Language Inference corpus (SNLI)

dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating diverse text generation methods, particularly in the context of machine translation and summarization.
